name: Connect 4 (itch) (J Bizzel)
description:
Connect 4 - PVP. 

This is a demo/wip. Although 2 people can play this game as it is.

This is the first time I've coded in assembler, so it has been an interesting learning journey for me. 

My focus was on a smooth scrolling game. This is quite different to other connect 4 games I have seen for the spectrum. Actually most seem coded in basic.

This is far from finished and there is still lots to do....

  • The game does not yet detect a win condition.
  • What happens if the player make an illegal move is not ideal
  • There is no PvE game play.

Keys

1-7 drops a block

0 restarts the game.

You need a zx spectrum emulator to play this game, or a real spectrum.
